nodeList.nodeDescription:
Summons a sigil that orbits you, causing you and your allies' attacks and spells to deal 4 additional fire damage and increasing  health regeneration by 25%.

You can have up to 3 sigils at a time. Sigils expire after 15 seconds.

nodeList.description: Sigils increase the damage of you and your allies.
nodeList.nodeDescription: You and your allies gain [6%] increased damage per point per active Sigil.
